Package com.tloj.game.abilities

package com.tloj.game.abilities
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.tloj.game
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BossAbility
    Abstract class that represents an ability that a boss can use.
    CyberPoison
    An ability that poisons the attacker with a 45% probability, by inflicting to the player an amount of damage equals to the mob's level
    It is paired with the JunkSlime.
    DodgeEvenRoll
    An ability that allows a boss to disable the attacker damage bonus if the attacker's weapon dice roll is an even number.
    DodgeFlying
    An ability that allows the mob to dodge an attack with a 25% probability.
    HalveDamage
    An ability that allows a boss to halven the player's weapon roll.
    MobAbility
    Abstract class representing an ability that a mob can use during combat.
    NibbleItem
    An ability that allows the mob to destroy a random item from the player's inventory once per fight with a 20% probability
    It is paired with the MechaRat.
    StealItem
    An ability that allows the mob to steal from 3 to 6 BTCs once per fight with a 25% probability
    It is paired with the CyberGoblin.
    VampireDodge
    An ability that allows a boss to dodge player's attack and heal itself of player's weapon roll with a 33% probability.
